name: Arukone
description:
Classic japanese game.
If you like Sudoku you will love this game.

Connect the numbers of the same kind.
Tap with your finger on a number and move to the second number of the same kind to connect them.
When all numbers are connected you have won the level.
The game offers one level pack for free. Additional levels can be bought on the main menu of the game. Each additional level pack has 100 levels.
